title: Terror of Tuscany
description: They say I’m the Terror of Tuscany, and that’s exactly what I’m going to be if anything goes sideways with this shipment that I’m expecting next Tuesday.The name’s Gio, and people call me a lot of things, but unprepared definitely isn’t one of them. But that’s absolutely what I am for the first time in my life when I come face to face with my new stepsister.I wasn’t prepared to be a stepbrother in any capacity more than in title when my dad up and remarried. But when my sexy stepsister calls me a name, one I’ve never heard before and am in no way prepared for, I realize she needs me to be more than just her stepbrother…she needs me to be her Daddy.But it seems I’m not the only one who’s obsessed with my little girl. When a stalker tries to take what belongs to this mafia prince, I’m ready to end him, only to find out that my pint-sized princess is just the tough little sassy spitfire that this underworld Italian needs…sempre e per sempre.
author: Lena Little
